channel.title: Some annoying shit? lol
channel.description:
When I run my server this is what it says in the DOS box...
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:116)[/code]
And when I log into the client this is what shows up...
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string : "%1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.orbs(client.java:12360) at client.method62(client.java:3469) at client.method7(client.java:2582) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120) at client.run(client.java:5383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
The screen just stays black when I log in.. FFS SO FRUSTRATED been like this all day? someone help?
I don't know what the fuck this means..

item.title: Some annoying shit? lol
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

oh, ty ill try fixing that.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2009, 09:01:28 pm[/size][hr]shit, lol this is going to take me a million and a half years.

Read full topic

item.title: Some annoying shit? lol
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You used a space instead of a tab in a configuration file.

Read full topic
